code: import i18n from'i18next';import Backend from'i18next-http-backend';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import translationRu from'./locales/ru/translation.json';import translationEn from'./locales/en/translation.json';import translationZhCN from'./locales/cn/translation.json';var resources={'ru':{translation:translationRu},'en':{translation:translationEn},'cn':{translation:translationZhCN}};i18n.use(Backend).use(initReactI18next).use(LanguageDetector).init({fallbackLng:'en',debug:true,supportedLngs:['ru','en','cn'],resources:resources,detection:{order:['navigator']},interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
